article.title: My $99 Apple Smart Home
article.author: Tom Rodrigues
article.excerpt: With a growing smart home tech market, many of us want to get involved but are put off by the high price tags. What if you could automate your home for less than $100?

authors.bio: Hey, I’m Tom. Check out my posts, I’m sure you’ll find something interesting…
authors.name: Tom Rodrigues

next.title: RNA Vaccines
next.author: Tom Rodrigues
next.excerpt: Developing vaccines usually takes a long time, but during a pandemic, time is at a premium. RNA vaccines might be the solution.

next.title: My DIY Smart Sprinklers
next.author: Tom Rodrigues
next.excerpt: Smart sprinkler systems make caring for your garden dynamic and easy. How easy is it to make our own instead?
